result.eng: We were in the same class together.
result.ga: bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.orig: bhí muid in aon rang le chéile
result.html: bhí muid in aon rang le chéileWe were in the same class together.
result.ponchtml: ḃí muid in aon rang le ċéileWe were in the same class together.

result.eng: He is the cleverest boy in the class.
result.ga: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rang
result.orig: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rang
result.html: tá sé ar an bhuachaill is cliste sa rangHe is the cleverest boy in the class.
result.ponchtml: tá sé ar an ḃuaċaill is cliste sa rangHe is the cleverest boy in the class.

result.eng: There is a person from America in my class.
result.ga: tá duine as meiriceá i mo rang
result.orig: tá duine as meiriceá i mo rang
result.html: tá duine as meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.
result.ponchtml: tá duine as meiriceá i mo rangThere is a person from America in my class.

result.eng: The first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ga: tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.orig: tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlog
result.html: tosaíonn an chéad rang ag a hocht a chlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.
result.ponchtml: tosaíonn an ċéad rang ag a hoċt a ċlogThe first class begins at eight o'clock.
